short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When sharing documents or inviting guests, I paint red the users whose email address doesn't include the registered email domain.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension helps you avoid sharing documents with wrong people and inviting wrong guests in Google Workspace.
The extension paints red the users whose email address doesn't include your registered email domain when you share documents by Google Drive/ Google Spreadsheets/ Google Slides or invite guests in Google Calendar.
Click the icon on your browser toolbar to register email domain.
You can register multiple email domains.
If you want to use the extension function for the tabs opened before installing the extension, reload the tabs with F5.
